title: Stripe Joins With OpenAI to Allow Etsy Purchases Via ChatGPT
description: The payment-processing company Stripe Inc. is working with OpenAI to allow US shoppers to buy products through ChatGPT, the popular artificial-intelligence tool. The feature is being rolled out to let ChatGPT users purchase goods from Etsy Inc., with plans to soon extend it to Shopify Inc., Stripe said in a statement Monday. The goal is for ChatGPT to act like a digital personal shopper, Emily Glassberg Sands, Stripe’s head of data and AI, said in an interview.
content:

title: Lufthansa Set To Cut 4,000 Jobs By 2030 As AI And Automation Take Over
description: In an attempt to boost profitability and operational efficiency, Lufthansa is set to cut 4,000 jobs by 2030, the company confirmed on Monday. The job cut is part of a major restructuring as the German airline company looks to fast-track the adoption of artificial intelligence and automation.
content:

title: Wall Street indexes climb as investors brush off government shutdown uncertainties
description: Wall Street indexes closed higher on Monday. Nasdaq led gains driven by technology stocks. Investors focused on artificial intelligence and future interest rate cuts. Concerns over a potential US government shutdown were largely overlooked. Market experts noted investor focus on economic resilience. This positive sentiment propelled major indices upwards.
